attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
IDX information is provided exclusively for personal, non-commercial use, and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties consumers may be interested in purchasing.
Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

data.description: Calling all investors!  Check out this opportunity for a single family home or convert back to an incoming producing duplex*This home is in various stages of a DIY remodel throughout the entire interior, you can make the interior whatever you want it to be!  Nice covered back patio and a flat read yard. Level paved parking pad*one car detached garage is probably a tear down*Home and garage being sold with all contents*
